name: Resources Xchange
description: Resources Xchange is a platform that introduces a new way of learning skills. You can find skills that you are interested in and request a learning exchange with your current skills.
tech: Built with Ruby on Rails, React, Redux, Google Map Javascript API, JWT.

name: Project Planner
description: Project Planner is a tool that allows you to track, browse, search, sort, create, and edit current projects. You can also view the details, add and delete notes.
tech: Built with RoR API, React, Semantic-UI, CSS.

name: Portland ME Weather
description: Real time Portland, Maine weather display and conversion.
tech: Built with HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, OpenWeather API.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: Wonder how I built this blazing fast online portfolio? Gatsby! Check out my Github for details.
post: Read my recent post about it.
